head.supplied: ¶ [Royal Soc. Medal. For copy of Agt Genls despatch fwding.] ¶ The Royal Society of London had awarded M one of its two Royal Medals for 1888 'for his long services in Australian exploration, and for...

div.p: No. 1543, vol. 1889 N, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, dated 5 February 1889.
[Royal Soc. Medal. For copy of Agt Genls despatch fwding.]
The Royal Society of London had awarded M one of its two Royal Medals for 1888 'for his long services in Australian exploration, and for his Investigations of the flora of the Australian Continent'.The Agent General was invited toreceivethe Medal on M's behalfand 'transmit it atyour convenience to Baron von Mueller'(M. Foster to G. Berry, 9 November 1888 (Royal Society of London Archives,NLB/2/806)), and did so at theSociety'sAnniversary Meeting held on 30 November.
M'sletter was returned tohimon 6 February 1889 minuted: 'See attached file'.A request from the Premier's Department that the Agent-General's despatchbe returnedwas referredfrom the Chief Secretary's Officeto M on 13 February, minuted 'Return file'.Mdid soon 16 Februarywith his thanks, and the file wassentto the Premier's Department on 22 February.
